kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (117.0.5938.149) detected in PATH at C:\Users\renat\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python312\Scripts\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (118.0.5993.120); currently, chromedriver 118.0.5993.70 is recommended for chrome 118.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Fralda Bigfral Plus XG 7 Unidades' into text field 'id:twotabsearchtextbox'.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element '//span[normalize-space()='Fralda Bigfral Plus XG 7 Unidades']'.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
